Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
  GameBoard

public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a board, makes all the moves and controls the game

Version:
1.2
Author:
Peter Sallai

Constructor Summary
GameBoard()
          Constructor - initialises the starting board
 
Method Summary
 void currentScore()
          Method - displays the current score of the game
 void displayBoard()
          Method - displays the updated board after each move
 boolean gameMove()
          Method - enables user to make a move, checks if the move is valid
 boolean gameOver()
          Method - checks if all the squares have been filled, if yes, ends the game
 void gameOverScreen()
          Method - displayes the final board after the game is finished and states the final score
 void loadGame()
          Method - loads the most recent saved game from savedgame.txt document
 void saveGame()
          Method - saves the game at its current state to the savedgame.txt document
